item.title: Orgzly and never lose your notes again
item.author: gmail.com (Earving)
item.description: I wanted to write a post about Orgzly for a few days, but I have been very busy these days. As I told in previous posts, I started using orgmode at work, but not for my everyday personal tasksâ€¦ and suddenly I came across with Orgzly.

item.title: Org-roam & Windows
item.author: gmail.com (Earving)
item.description: Org-roam Org-roam is a note-taking tool for Emacs using Org-mode. It is a replica of RoamResearch: "A note-taking tool for networked thought". Both are based in the Zettelkasten method, which is described as: Using a Zettelkasten is about optimizing a workflow of learning and producing knowledge.
